https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/mcyjUnD8cfRLPlQZrQRGmfJp7bW.jpg Movie star Aaron, busted for road rage assault, is sent by his lawyer to a meditation teacher, Rachel, for help. He undermines their sessions with seductive behavior. Falling for his charm, she has to stop seeing him. He's arrested again. 4th Noble Truth
